articles.description: We got to spend some time with the iQOO Z9s Pro ahead of its launch on August 21. The iQOO Z9 lineup currently includes three models in India - Z9, Z9...
articles.content:
The iQOO Z9 lineup currently includes three models in India - Z9, Z9 Lite, and Z9x. These will be joined by two 's' versions on August 21, called iQOO Z9s and iQOO Z9s Pro.

articles.title: India’s CERT-IN flags ‘multiple vulnerabilities’ in software of Apple devices including iPhone, VisionPro headset, Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch - The Hindu
articles.description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team, or CERT-IN, has flagged multiple vulnerabilities in Apple software products.
articles.content:
The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team, or CERT-IN, has flagged multiple vulnerabilities in Apple software products and given them a severity rating of High in an advisory dated August 2.
